Package main.java.matrices.discretisation

Interface Discretise

  • public interface Discretise
    Interface which is used to access the static methods that control matrix discretisation. Note that matrix discretisation can only be performed on dMatrix objects.
    Author:
    Joshua McDonagh

    • Method Summary

      Static Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static CMatrix<java.lang.String> byFrequency​(DMatrix doubleMatrix, int numOfBins)
      Discretises matrix content by the frequency of values.
      static CMatrix<java.lang.String> byWidth​(DMatrix doubleMatrix, int numOfBins)
      Discretises matrix content by the width of the matrix.

    • Method Detail

      • byFrequency

        static CMatrix<java.lang.String> byFrequency​(DMatrix doubleMatrix,
                                             int numOfBins)
        Discretises matrix content by the frequency of values.
        Parameters:
        doubleMatrix - Matrix to be discretised
        numOfBins - Number of bins to use for discretisation
        Returns:
        Discretised comparable matrix containing string values

      • byWidth

        static CMatrix<java.lang.String> byWidth​(DMatrix doubleMatrix,
                                         int numOfBins)
        Discretises matrix content by the width of the matrix.
        Parameters:
        doubleMatrix - Matrix to be discretised
        numOfBins - Number of bins to use for discretisation
        Returns:
        Discretised comparable matrix containing string values
